Package gridAutomaton

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Grid
    A grid.
    Orientation
    Orientation of a cell.
    Rule
    A rule is either true or false.
    State
    The number of states of a cell is not limited, meaning, it's not necessary that a cell could be alive or dead.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Backup Deprecated
    Used as a local copy of a grid, contained informations such as the state of a cell, the numbers of alive neighbors.
    Cell
    A cell basically contains two informations : its state (e.g. dead or alive) and its neighbors.
    Conway
    The two states of a cell in Conway's game are : dead or alive which can be represented by a boolean.
    DeathRule
    Rules to match for a live cell to stay alive on to the next generation, otherwise it dies.
    GoldenRule
    This rule is effective when a cell has exactly two states.
    LifeRule
    Rule to match to make a dead cell becoming a live cell either way, it stays dead on to the next generation.
    Main
    The main is here.
    Neighbor
    A neighbor is basically a cell.
    SquareGrid
    This grid is squared and toric.
